block.p: Tara Celeste Abrams, the daughter of Lynn Gale of Redondo Beach, Calif., and Mark Abrams of Irvington, N.Y., was married last evening to Judd Parker Levine, a son of Sharyn and Paul Levine of Merrick, N.Y. Cantor Bernard Zahn officiated at the Arizona Biltmore in Phoenix.

The bride, 30, is the director of business development in the New York office of Arnold Worldwide, a Boston advertising agency. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin. Her father is the executive vice president and chief investment officer at Presidential Life Insurance Company in Nyack, N.Y. The bride is the stepdaughter of Cynthia Abrams and David Schneider and is a descendant of Joseph Bulova, the watchmaker.

Tara Celeste Abrams, the daughter of Lynn Gale of Redondo Beach, Calif., and Mark Abrams of Irvington, N.Y., was married last evening to Judd Parker Levine, a son of Sharyn and Paul Levine of Merrick, N.Y. Cantor Bernard Zahn officiated at the Arizona Biltmore in Phoenix.

Tara Celeste Abrams, the daughter of Lynn Gale of Redondo Beach, Calif., and Mark Abrams of Irvington, N.Y., was married last evening to Judd Parker Levine, a son of Sharyn and Paul Levine of Merrick, N.Y. Cantor Bernard Zahn officiated at the Arizona Biltmore in Phoenix.

The bride, 30, is the director of business development in the New York office of Arnold Worldwide, a Boston advertising agency. She graduated from the University of Wisconsin. Her father is the executive vice president and chief investment officer at Presidential Life Insurance Company in Nyack, N.Y. The bride is the stepdaughter of Cynthia Abrams and David Schneider and is a descendant of Joseph Bulova, the watchmaker.
The bridegroom, 28, is the vice president of Triple Crown Maffucci Bekins Moving and Storage in Amityville, N.Y., a company owned by his parents. He graduated from Indiana University.
